wikipedia_page.main: Michael Hunter (born 27 May 1948) is an English former footballer who played as a forward in the Football League for Darlington and in the League of Ireland for Sligo Rovers. He was on the books of Blackpool without representing them in the League. Hunter joined Sligo Rovers in August 1968, and played for them until at least 1970.

response: Michael or Mike Hunter may refer to:
* Mike Hunter (footballer) (born 1948), English football forward with Darlington and in Ireland with Sligo Rovers
* Mike Hunter (soccer) (born 1958), retired U.S. soccer defender
